If you would like to play Stop To Shoot it is highly recommended that you learn to stop in order to shoot. Failing to understand this game play/game engine mechanic will result in a complete failure to play the game effectively.

Its an okay game i guess

The quality of the game and balance of maps and weapons is flawless. A classic game, that looks very good even to this day.

The massive issues stem from the community itself. The game is filled with hackers, players that play on lower skill levels just to dominate new players and many, many toxic russians.
There is a trading side of the game, but that as well is filled with many controversies and scammers to the brim. Not even to count the many people that hack accounts to steal all your valuble items and then spam all your friends with physing links.

Recently also a former Valve developer said that the game is going downwards, since the games code is a complete mess and the developers don't fix anything unless it's absolutely groundbreaking.
Such a good game for being so old, this is one game I keep playing after all my years owning an computer. Big love and support for you <3

have about 3k hours on the game over my past accounts. I decided to make a mew account the game is till fun, but if you expect to enjoy the ranking games then i would recommend buying prime to avoid cheaters.

RECOMIENDO ESTE JUEGO? SÍ, pero a su desarrolladora NO. Son unos tremendos sacaperras. Tienes que pagar por absolutamente todo, y cuando por fín tienen la oportunidad de meter una buena actualización PAM te cobramos por una copia del matchmaking de Faceit (completamente gratuito) PAM te cobramos por los stats que en juegos como Valorant está implementado desde el primer día. Valve es la cúspide del capitalismo, una empresa a la que el jugador le importa bien poco y sacar millones mucho.
